name: CCIOT 2019 4th CFP on Cloud Computing and Internet of Things Tokyo, Japan
content: Conference official website：http://www.cciot.org/ Meeting time：September 20-22, 2019\. Meeting place：Tokyo, Japan/HOTEL SUNROUTE PLAZA SHINJUKU. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Latif Ladid, University of Luxemburg, Luxemburg. Prof. Dimitrios Georgakopoulos, Swinburne University of Technology, Australia. Prof. Kuo-Hui Yeh, National Dong Hwa University, Taiwan. Published by： 1\. CCIOT 2019 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter. 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series （ISBN: 978-1-4503-7241-1）by ACM and indexed by Ei Compendex and submitted to be reviewed by Scopus and Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index. Call for Papers： Digital health/Telehealth/Telemedicine. Smart Farming. Smart Grids. Knowledge Representation and Reasoning. Machine Learning. Pattern Recognition. Cloud as a Service. Cloud Infrastructure. Multimedia communication. Multimedia communications over wireless. Network architectures and protocols. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : July 15, 2019\. Deadline (abstract) : July 31, 2019\. Registration Deadline: August 20, 2019\. Conference Contact :Ms. Ming Chang mailbox: cciot.conference@gmail.com Tel: +86-021-59561560
